Folake Oritsegbubemi Onayemi (amụrụ Ọktoba 4, 1964) bụ Prọfesọ nke Classics na onye isi ngalaba mmụta Classics na Mahadum Ibadan dị na Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e nyere PhD na Classics na Nigeria na nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Sub-Saharan Africa
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ịtụnyere akwụkwọ, omenala na akụkọ ifo ndị Gris na Rom na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị metụtara ọrụ na nnọchite anya ụmụnwanyị.

Folake Onayemi gara mahadum nke Ibadan maka BA ya na Classics (1986), sochiri MA (1990), MPhil (1997), na PhD (2001); ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ e nyere nzere PhD na Classics na Nigeria, jiri akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Fear of Beauty Women in Classical and African/ Yoruba Literature
N'oge PhD ya, ọ nọrọ oge dịka Ọkà mmụta nleta na Mahadum Brown, Rhode Island

A họpụtara Onayemi ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka onye nkuzi na ngalaba “Classic of University of Ibadan” n’afọ 1994, wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara ọkwa a na ngalaba ahụ, ma were ọkwa na ọkwa abụọ nke onye nkuzi (Lecturer II na 1996, Lecturer I)

n'afọ 1999), nye onye nkuzi Senior n'afọ 2002, na Reader n'afọ 2005; n'afọ 2008, nkwalite ya na Prọfesọ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Mahadum Ibadan na nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ Prọfesọ nke Classics na Sub-saharan Africa

Okwu mmeghe ya, nke e nyere n'ụbọchị 23 n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2016, bụ isiokwu " Paradigms of Life from Ancient Greek Literature ", wee nyochaa mkpa ọrụ Homer, Sophocles na Plutarch na-aga n'ihu na ndụ na Nigeria ugbu a

Onayemi abụrụla Prọfesọ nleta na Department of Classics, University of Texas at Austin, (2001); Ọkà mmụta nleta na Ngalaba Ochie, Mahadum Ghana (2009-2010, 2013-14); nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria nke Bayo Kuku Postdoctoral Fellowship (2004), John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation Fellowship (2005), na Alexander S
Onassis Foundation Fellowship (2006-7)

Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na American Council of Learned Societies' Humanities Programme, na onye nnọchiteanya Naijiria na International Federation of the Societies of Classical Studies (FIEC); ọ na-edezikwa akwụkwọ akụkọ ngalaba Nigeria and the Classics
Nchọcha Onayemi bụ nke kacha n'ihe ọmụmụ ntụnyere nke Greco-Roman na Nigerian ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ na omenala Africa, ngalaba nke ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Ibadan (gụnyere Prof
Olakunbi Olasope ) enyela nnukwu onyinye

Ọ na-elekwasị anya karịsịa na ọrụ ụmụnwanyị na ihe nnọchiteanya ha na akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri, bụ nke o bipụtara akwụkwọ abụọ   na ọtụtụ akụkọ,        ma ebipụtawokwa ihe ọmụmụ ntụnyere nke okpukpe Grik na nke Yoruba,   na akụkọ banyere ọrụ nke Classics dị ka ọzụzụ na omenala Naijiria na Afrika nke oge a na ọha mmadụ

Ọ bụkwa onye odee, ya na Kofi Ackah, nke A Guide to Ancient Greek Literary History (2011), akwụkwọ ọgụgụ e bu n'obi iwebata ụmụ akwụkwọ Africa nke Classics n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ edemede Greek oge ochie na akụkọ ihe mere eme ha

Onayemi pụtara na mmemme nke BBC World Service 's 'The Forum', nke isiokwu ya bụ 'The Iliad: Beauty, Brutes and Battles', na-atụle mmalite nke Iliad, isiokwu na mkpa na-aga n'ihu na ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa, na 7 Dec
2016; Bettany Hughes gosipụtara mmemme ahụ, ndị ọzọ sonyere gụnyere Edith Hall

Na Maachị 2019, o kwuru nkuzi isi okwu akpọrọ 'Yoruba Adaptations of Classical Literature' na ọgbakọ mba ụwa na 'Classical Antiquity and Local Identities: from Newfoundland to Nigeria and Ghana', nke emere na Mahadum Memorial
Onayemi ga-ekwu okwu isi okwu na 'Global Classics and Africa: Past, Present, and Future' na Mahadum Ghana, Legon, na October 2020
